title: Message to the Chenango County Republican Women's Education League.
text:
I SEND CORDIAL greetings to your committee, and my warm appreciation of their invaluable cooperation in carrying forward the high ideals of the Republican Party. The battle will be won by such aggressive campaigns as you are waging.

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [Mrs. Olive J. Gould, Chairman, Educational League, Delphi, New York]
